converter.name: 3DEXPERIENCE
converter.comment: all the conversion managed asynchronously by DS, By DerivedFormatConverter (OnTheEdge DO converter) or Conversion Service

parameter.name: ApplicationProtocol
parameter.description: Specifies the STEP format into which the data will be exported as explained in Dealing with STEP Data

parameter.name: Composites
parameter.description: At least one Composites Design app required

parameter.name: AdditionalFeatures
parameter.description: adjust the CATIA V5 level according to the needed features

parameter.name: exportKnowledgeParameter
parameter.description: Allows you to export the knowledge parameter of a feature as metadata

parameter.name: exportSurpacObjectMode
parameter.description: Allows you to export a single String or TriObject to group all the geometrical features aggregated under the same Geometrical Set. When it is not selected, each geometrical feature is exported in a separated String or triObject.

parameter.name: exportMagnitudeLength
parameter.description: select a specific unit for export of Length magnitude.

parameter.name: optimisedBoundingBox
parameter.description: Smallest parallelepiped volume that contains the part

parameter.name: MultiSheetMode
parameter.description: Define what sheets will the PDF includes

parameter.name: ExcludeDetailSheet
parameter.description: Exclude the details sheets of the drawing in the PDF

parameter.name: WhiteVectorsInBlack
parameter.description: Change the white vector in black to be seen on white background

parameter.name: MultiSheetMode
parameter.description: Define what sheets will the TIF includes

parameter.name: ExcludeDetailSheet
parameter.description: Exclude the details sheets of the drawing in the TIF

parameter.name: WhiteVectorsInBlack
parameter.description: Change the white vector in black to be seen on white background

parameter.name: MultiSheetMode
parameter.description: Define what sheets will the DWG includes

parameter.name: MultiSheetMode
parameter.description: Define what sheets will the DXF includes

parameter.description: Specifies the STEP format into which the data will be exported as explained in Dealing with STEP Data

parameter.description: Define what sheets will the DXF includes

parameter.name: Polyhedral
parameter.description: Map SLW MESH data as polyhedral in linkable/requires CXR27/ break CV5 compatibility
